text: Can you help me modify a schedule item?
Sure, what would you like to modify about the schedule item?
I need to change the time and location of my grocery shopping on March 17th.
Let me search for the relevant tools for modifying a schedule item.

text: Alright, I found an API that can help you with that. To modify the schedule item, I need your token. Can you please provide me with your username and password so I can authenticate you?
My username is "foo" and my password is "bar".
Now, can you give me the details of the modification you would like to make?
Sure, the content is "Shopping for groceries", the time is "2023-03-17", and I want to change the location to "Walmart".
